verbose_text: Since it has been established that both insulin [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] and cortisol [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] have negative and regulatory effects on the levels of ghrelin, a novel approach for weight control and weight loss would be to attempt to control ghrelin levels by attempting to moderate the preprandial increase.
